short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get twitch points while watching streams

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension automatically claims Channel Points on Twitch!
Automatic Twitch improves your experience on twitch.tv by taking care one of the tedious and repetitive tasks.

Key features:
• Automatically claim Channel Points as soon as they become available.
• Doesn't require any setup.
• Does not conflict with other extensions.
• Does not rely on the UI, but uses the internal APIs of the site, no need to open chat or press any buttons.

The extension claims only Channel Points that you have earned for watching, it does not allow you to increase their number dishonestly or receive rewards without watching content.
